I'm trying to do a crawl that is using the default configuration and is usi=
ng only one site as a seed. I get some results and the crawl finishes corre=
ctly. When I use the google search with the option site:my_seed_site I get =
much more hits then using heritrix. 

Is there a way to explain this? Shoul=
d I configure something differently then just the defaults?

Thanks for you=
r help!
